00105 #define HPSS_SSM "hpss_ssm"
00106 #define HPSS_KEYTAB "/krb5/hpssserver.keytab"

00108 int lru_entry_to_str( LRU_data_t data, char * str) 
00109 {
00110   cache_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00111   
00112   pentry =  (cache_entry_t *)data.pdata ;
00113   
00114   return sprintf( str, "Pentry: Addr %p, state=%d", pentry, pentry->internal_md.valid_state ) ;
00115 } /* lru_entry_to_str */
00116 
00117 int lru_clean_entry( LRU_entry_t * entry, void * adddata) 
00118 {
00119   return 0 ;
00120 } /* lru_clean_entry */

00135 main(int argc, char * argv[] )
00136 {
00137   log_t log_desc_fsal = LOG_INITIALIZER;
00138   log_t log_desc_cache =  LOG_INITIALIZER;
00139   char  localmachine[256] ;
00140   desc_log_stream_t  voie_fsal ;
00141   desc_log_stream_t  voie_cache ;
00142 
00143   cache_inode_client_t client ;
00144   LRU_parameter_t lru_param ;
00145   LRU_status_t lru_status ;
00146   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsdata ;
00147   
00148   fsal_status_t   status;
00149   fsal_parameter_t  init_param;
00150   fsal_name_t name;
00151   fsal_path_t path;
00152   fsal_attrib_mask_t mask;
00153   fsal_path_t pathroot ;
00154   fsal_attrib_list_t attribs;
00155   fsal_handle_t root_handle ;
00156 
00157   cache_inode_endofdir_t eod_met ;
00158   cache_inode_dir_entry_t dirent_array[100] ;
00159   cache_inode_dir_entry_t dirent_array_loop[5] ;
00160   unsigned int nbfound ;
00161   
00162   unsigned int begin_cookie = 0 ;
00163   hash_buffer_t key, value ;
00164   
00165   uid_t uid;
00166   fsal_cred_t cred;
00167 
00168   cache_inode_status_t  cache_status ;
00169   cache_inode_parameter_t cache_param ;
00170   cache_inode_client_parameter_t cache_client_param ;
00171   
00172   hash_table_t * ht = NULL ;
00173   fsal_attrib_list_t attrlookup ;
00174   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_root   = NULL ;
00175   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup = NULL ;
00176   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup2 = NULL ;
00177   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup3 = NULL ;
00178   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup4 = NULL ;
00179   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_dircont = NULL ;
00180   
00181   cache_inode_gc_policy_t gcpol ;
00182   
00183   char * configfile = argv[1] ;
00184   int i = 0 ;
00185   int rc = 0 ;
00186   
00187   /* Init the Buddy System allocation */
00188   if( ( rc = BuddyInit( NULL ) ) != BUDDY_SUCCESS )
00189     {
00190       fprintf( stderr, "Error while Initing the Buddy system allocator"  ) ;
00191       exit( 1 ) ;
00192     }
00193   
00194 
00195   /* init debug */
00196   SetNamePgm( "test_cache_inode" ) ;
00197   SetNameFunction( "main" ) ;
00198   SetNameFileLog( "/dev/tty" ) ;
00199 
00200 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )
00201   if( argc != 2 )
00202     {
00203       fprintf( stderr, "Please set the configuration file as parameter\n" ) ;
00204       exit( 1 ) ;
00205     }
00206 #endif
00207   
00208   /* Obtention du nom de la machine */
00209   if( gethostname( localmachine, sizeof( localmachine ) ) != 0 )
00210     {
00211       DisplayErrorLog( ERR_SYS, ERR_GETHOSTNAME, errno ) ;
00212       exit( 1 ) ;
00213     }
00214   else
00215     SetNameHost( localmachine ) ;
00216   
00217   InitDebug( NIV_FULL_DEBUG ) ;
00218   AddFamilyError( ERR_FSAL, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_FSAL ) ;  AddFamilyError( ERR_CACHE_INODE, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_cache_inode ) ;
00219   
00220   /* creating log */
00221   voie_fsal.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00222   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_fsal, V_FD,voie_fsal,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00223 
00224   voie_cache.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00225   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_cache, V_FD,voie_cache,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00226   
00227   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Starting the test" ) ;
00228   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "-----------------" ) ;
00229   
00230 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )
00231   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( configfile, 
00232                                              strlen( configfile )+1,
00233                                              &(init_param.fs_specific_info.definition_file ) ) ) )
00234     {
00235       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL,status.major,status.minor);
00236     }
00237  
00238 #elif defined( _USE_HPSS )
00239   
00240   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, Flags);
00241   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DebugValue);
00242   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, TransferType);
00243   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, NumRetries);
00244   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, BusyDelay);
00245   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, BusyRetries);
00246   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, TotalDelay);
00247   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, GKTotalDelay);
00248   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, LimitedRetries);
00249   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, MaxConnections);
00250   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, ReuseDataConnections);
00251   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, UsePortRange);
00252   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, RetryStageInp);
00253   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DMAPWriteUpdates);
00254   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, ServerName);
00255   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DescName);
00256   
00257   init_param.fs_specific_info.behaviors.PrincipalName = FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE;
00258   strncpy(init_param.fs_specific_info.hpss_config.PrincipalName, 
00259           HPSS_SSM, 
00260           HPSS_MAX_PRINCIPAL_NAME);  
00261 
00262   
00263   init_param.fs_specific_info.behaviors.KeytabPath = FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE ;
00264   strncpy(init_param.fs_specific_info.hpss_config.KeytabPath,
00265           HPSS_KEYTAB,
00266           HPSS_MAX_PATH_NAME);
00267 
00268   
00269   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DebugPath);
00270   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, HostName);
00271   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, RegistrySiteName);
00272   
00273   
00274 #endif
00275 
00276   /* 2-common info (default) */
00277   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info,maxfilesize);
00278   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info,maxlink);
00279   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxnamelen);
00280   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxpathlen);
00281   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, no_trunc);
00282   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, chown_restricted);
00283   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, case_insensitive);
00284   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, case_preserving);
00285   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, fh_expire_type);
00286   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, link_support);
00287   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, symlink_support);  
00288   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, named_attr);
00289   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, unique_handles);
00290   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, lease_time);
00291   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, acl_support);
00292   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, cansettime);
00293   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, homogenous);
00294   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxread);
00295   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxwrite);
00296   
00297   /* 3- fsal info*/
00298   init_param.fsal_info.log_outputs = log_desc_fsal;
00299   
00300   /* Init */
00301   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_Init( &init_param ) ) )
00302     {
00303       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00304     }
00305 
00306    /* getting creds */
00307   uid=getuid(); 
00308   
00309   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_GetUserCred( uid, NULL, &cred ) ) )
00310     {
00311       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00312     }
00313   
00314   /* Init of the cache inode module */
00315   cache_param.hparam.index_size       = 31 ;
00316   cache_param.hparam.alphabet_length  = 10 ; /* Buffer seen as a decimal polynom */
00317   cache_param.hparam.nb_node_prealloc = 100 ;
00318   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_key    = cache_inode_fsal_hash_func ;
00319   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_rbt    = cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func ;
00320   cache_param.hparam.compare_key      = cache_inode_compare_key_fsal ;
00321   cache_param.hparam.key_to_str       = display_key ;
00322   cache_param.hparam.val_to_str       = display_value ;
00323 
00324   if( ( ht = cache_inode_init( cache_param, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00325     {
00326       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error %d while init hash ", cache_status ) ;
00327     }
00328   else
00329     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Hash Table address = %p", ht ) ;
00330 
00331   /* We need a cache_client to acces the cache */  
00332   cache_client_param.log_outputs = log_desc_cache;
00333   cache_client_param.attrmask = FSAL_ATTRS_MANDATORY|FSAL_ATTR_MTIME|FSAL_ATTR_CTIME|FSAL_ATTR_ATIME  ; 
00334   cache_client_param.nb_prealloc_entry = 1000 ;
00335   cache_client_param.nb_pre_dir_data = 200 ;
00336   cache_client_param.nb_pre_parent = 1200 ;
00337   cache_client_param.nb_pre_state_v4 = 100 ;
00338   
00339   cache_client_param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = 1000 ;
00340   cache_client_param.lru_param.entry_to_str = lru_entry_to_str ;
00341   cache_client_param.lru_param.clean_entry = lru_clean_entry ;
00342 
00343   cache_client_param.grace_period_attr = 0 ; 
00344   cache_client_param.grace_period_link = 0 ; 
00345 
00346   /* Init the cache_inode client */
00347   if( cache_inode_client_init( &client, cache_client_param, 0 ) != 0 )
00348     exit( 1 ) ;
00349 
00350   /* Init the gc */
00351   gcpol.file_expiration_delay = 3 ;
00352   gcpol.directory_expiration_delay = 4 ;
00353   gcpol.hwmark_nb_entries = 6 ;
00354   gcpol.lwmark_nb_entries = 3 ;
00355   gcpol.run_interval = 4 ;
00356   
00357   cache_inode_set_gc_policy( gcpol ) ;
00358   
00359   /* Getting the root of the FS */
00360   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( "/", 2, &pathroot) )) )
00361     {
00362       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00363       exit( 1 ) ;
00364     }
00365   
00366   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_lookupPath( &pathroot, &cred, &root_handle, &attribs ) ) ) )
00367     {
00368       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00369       exit( 1 ) ;
00370     }
00371   fsdata.cookie = 0 ;
00372   fsdata.handle = root_handle ;
00373   
00374   /* Cache the root of the FS */
00375   if( ( cache_entry_root = cache_inode_make_root( &fsdata, 1, ht, &client, &cred, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00376     {
00377       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't init fs's root" ) ;
00378       exit( 1 ) ;
00379     }
00380 
00381   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00382   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00383     {
00384       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00385       exit( 1 ) ;
00386     }
00387 
00388   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00389                                                  &name, 
00390                                                  &attrlookup, 
00391                                                  ht, 
00392                                                  &client, 
00393                                                  &cred, 
00394                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00395     {
00396       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00397       exit( 1 ) ;
00398     }
00399 
00400   /* Lookup a second time (entry should now be cached) */
00401   if( ( cache_entry_lookup2 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00402                                                   &name, 
00403                                                   &attrlookup, 
00404                                                   ht, 
00405                                                   &client, 
00406                                                   &cred, 
00407                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00408     {
00409       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_fsal, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00410       exit( 1 ) ;
00411     }
00412  
00413   if( cache_entry_lookup2 != cache_entry_lookup ) 
00414     {
00415       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00416       exit( 1 ) ;
00417     }
00418   
00419    /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00420   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00421     {
00422       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00423       exit( 1 ) ;
00424     }
00425 
00426   if( ( cache_entry_lookup3 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00427                                                   &name, 
00428                                                   &attrlookup, 
00429                                                   ht, 
00430                                                   &client, 
00431                                                   &cred, 
00432                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00433     {
00434       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00435       exit( 1 ) ;
00436     }
00437   
00438   if( ( cache_entry_lookup4 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00439                                                   &name, 
00440                                                   &attrlookup, 
00441                                                   ht, 
00442                                                   &client, 
00443                                                   &cred, 
00444                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00445     {
00446       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00447       exit( 1 ) ;
00448     }
00449 
00450   if( cache_entry_lookup3 != cache_entry_lookup4 ) 
00451     {
00452       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00453       exit( 1 ) ;
00454     }
00455   
00456    /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00457   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "SunOS_5", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00458     {
00459       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00460       exit( 1 ) ;
00461     }
00462 
00463   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00464   
00465   /* Test readdir */
00466   if( cache_inode_readdir( cache_entry_root,
00467                            0, 
00468                            100,
00469                            &nbfound,
00470                            &eod_met, 
00471                            dirent_array, 
00472                            ht, 
00473                            &client, 
00474                            &cred, 
00475                            &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00476     {
00477       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: cache_inode_readdir failed\n" ) ;
00478       exit( 1 ) ;
00479     }
00480 
00481   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Readdir nbfound=%d, eod_met=%d", nbfound, eod_met ) ;
00482   for( i = 0 ; i < nbfound ; i++ )
00483     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "dirent_array[%d] ==> %s | %p", i, dirent_array[i].name.name, dirent_array[i].pentry ) ;
00484 
00485   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00486   
00487   /* looping on readir */
00488   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Loop directory in several pass" ) ;
00489   
00490   eod_met = TO_BE_CONTINUED ;
00491   begin_cookie = 0 ;
00492   
00493   do
00494     {
00495       
00496       if( cache_inode_readdir( cache_entry_root,
00497                                begin_cookie, 
00498                                2, 
00499                                &nbfound,
00500                                &eod_met, 
00501                                dirent_array_loop, 
00502                                ht, 
00503                                &client, 
00504                                &cred, 
00505                                &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00506       {
00507         printf( "Error: cache_inode_readdir failed: %d\n", cache_status ) ;
00508         exit( 1 ) ;
00509       }
00510       
00511       for( i = 0 ; i < nbfound ; i++ )
00512         DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, " ==> %s | %p", dirent_array_loop[i].name.name,  dirent_array_loop[i].pentry ) ;
00513 
00514 
00515       begin_cookie += nbfound ;
00516       
00517     } while ( eod_met == TO_BE_CONTINUED ) ;
00518   
00519   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00520 
00521   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00522   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00523     {
00524       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00525       exit( 1 ) ;
00526     }
00527   
00528   
00529   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00530                                                  &name, 
00531                                                  &attrlookup, 
00532                                                  ht, 
00533                                                  &client, 
00534                                                  &cred, 
00535                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00536     {
00537       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00538       exit( 1 ) ;
00539     }
00540 
00541   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00542   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00543     {
00544       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00545       exit( 1 ) ;
00546     }
00547 
00548   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00549                                                  &name, 
00550                                                  &attrlookup, 
00551                                                  ht, 
00552                                                  &client, 
00553                                                  &cred, 
00554                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00555     {
00556       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00557       exit( 1 ) ;
00558     }
00559 
00560 #ifdef _WITH_HASHTABLE_PRINT
00561   /* Print the Hash Table */ 
00562   HashTable_Print( ht ) ;
00563 #endif
00564 
00565 #ifdef _ADDITIONAL_TEST  
00566   /* Trying to lookup from a DIR_CONTINUE */
00567   fsdata.handle = cache_entry_root->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00568   fsdata.cookie = 3 * CHILDREN_ARRAY_SIZE ;
00569   
00570   printf( "Input key: (Handle=%p, Cookie=%d)\n", fsdata.handle, fsdata.cookie ) ;
00571                  
00572 
00573    /* Turn the input to a hash key */
00574   if( cache_inode_fsaldata_2_key( &key, &fsdata, NULL ) )
00575     {
00576       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Impossible to allocate a key to that value" ) ;
00577       exit( 1 ) ;
00578     }
00579 
00580   if( HashTable_Get( ht, &key, &value ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS   )
00581     {
00582       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Key could not be found" ) ;
00583       exit( 1 ) ;
00584     }
00585   
00586   /* pentry for the dir cont */
00587   cache_entry_dircont = (cache_entry_t *)value.pdata ;
00588 
00589   /* Test readdir */
00590   if( cache_inode_readdir( cache_entry_dircont,
00591                            fsdata.cookie, 
00592                            100,
00593                            &nbfound,
00594                            &eod_met, 
00595                            dirent_array, 
00596                            ht, 
00597                            &client, 
00598                            &cred, 
00599                            &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00600     {
00601       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: cache_inode_readdir failed" ) ;
00602       exit( 1 ) ;
00603     }
00604 #endif
00605 
00606   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Readdir nbfound=%d, eod_met=%d", nbfound, eod_met ) ;
00607   for( i = 0 ; i < nbfound ; i++ )
00608     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "dirent_array[%d] ==> %s | %p ", i, dirent_array[i].name.name, dirent_array[i].pentry ) ;
00609 
00610   /* Call the GC */
00611   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Sleeping %d second before gc (for gc invalidation)", gcpol.file_expiration_delay + 2 );
00612   sleep( gcpol.file_expiration_delay + 2 ) ;
00613   
00614   if( cache_inode_gc( ht, &client, &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00615     {
00616       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: cache_inode_gc failed" ) ;
00617       exit( 1 ) ;
00618     }
00619   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "GC performed successfully" ) ;
00620   
00621 #ifdef _WITH_HASHTABLE_PRINT
00622   /* Print the Hash Table */ 
00623   HashTable_Print( ht ) ;
00624 #endif
00625   
00626   /* Another readdir, after gc is made */
00627   eod_met = TO_BE_CONTINUED ;
00628   begin_cookie = 0 ;
00629   
00630   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "ANOTHER READDIR AFTER GC" ) ;
00631   
00632   do
00633     {
00634       
00635       if( cache_inode_readdir( cache_entry_root,
00636                                begin_cookie, 
00637                                2, 
00638                                &nbfound,
00639                                &eod_met, 
00640                                dirent_array_loop, 
00641                                ht, 
00642                                &client, 
00643                                &cred, 
00644                                &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00645       {
00646         printf( "Error: cache_inode_readdir failed: %d\n", cache_status ) ;
00647         exit( 1 ) ;
00648       }
00649       
00650       for( i = 0 ; i < nbfound ; i++ )
00651         DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, " ==> %s | %p", dirent_array_loop[i].name.name, dirent_array_loop[i].pentry ) ;
00652 
00653 
00654       begin_cookie += nbfound ;
00655       
00656     } while ( eod_met == TO_BE_CONTINUED ) ;
00657   
00658   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00659   
00660 #ifdef _WITH_HASHTABLE_PRINT
00661   /* Print the Hash Table */ 
00662   HashTable_Print( ht ) ;
00663 #endif
00664   
00665   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00666   
00667   /* The end of all the tests */
00668   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "All tests exited successfully" ) ;
00669   
00670   exit( 0 ) ;
00671 } /* main */
